nde2.methodcalls.discovery

Class BaseMethodCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.methodcalls.BaseMethodCall
      • nde2.methodcalls.discovery.BaseMethodCall
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FindAreasMethodCall, GetAreaChildrenMethodCall, GetAreaDetailMethodCall, GetCompatibleSubjectsMethodCall

    public abstract class BaseMethodCall
extends BaseMethodCall
    This class specifies the NeSS/NDE2 Discovery endpoint of the web service and provides a base method for interacting with it.
    Author:
    filip

    • Method Detail

      • doCall_base

        protected org.w3c.dom.Document doCall_base(java.lang.String method,
                               java.util.Dictionary<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                                    throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                           org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                           java.io.IOException,
                                           javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException,
                                           NDE2Exception
        This method uses BaseMethodCall .doCall_base() to call the required method on the server, and then checks for service errors. Actual method calls to the NeSS API can, therefore, simply supply this function with required parameters and expect a valid response.
        Parameters:
        method - NeSS/NDE2 method to be called
        params - Parameters of the NeSS/NDE2 method
        Returns:
        A Document representation of the response, which is unlikely to contain errors.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - See BaseMethodCall
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - See BaseMethodCall
        java.io.IOException - See BaseMethodCall
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - Thrown if XPath fails
        NDE2Exception - Thrown if the server returned an <Error> instead of expected result
